title: Challenger Nidalee
body: For context, I do not typically lag. My computer is not a toaster, and I have Gigabit internet, hooked up through ethernet. That being said Challenger Nidalee gives me problems. whenever she casts a spell at the edge of fog of war (every time she ganks the spear) My frame rate drops to literal 0 for around 2 secs. so my champ sits there until the free spear lands and she jumps on me. This is excessively frustrating that because someone bought a skin they are getting a free pass on me with every gank. I'm not blaming riot, I am just asking that it gets looked into.

replies.body:
Hello trentonius! 

Thanks for the solid report! We're aware of this issue and are working on a fix.
